casebody.data:
Blake and Courtney FREEMAN, individually and on behalf of their minor children
v.
FON'S PEST MANAGEMENT, INC. and ABC Insurance Company No. 2018-OC-0035 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 16, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FIRST CIRCUIT, PARISH OF EAST BATON ROUGE PER CURIAM:

Granted. In light of our action in Freeman v. Fon's Pest Management, Inc. , 17-1846 (La. 2/9/18), 235 So.3d 1087 , the judgment of the court of appeal dismissing relator's appeal as moot is vacated and set aside. The case is remanded to the court of appeal for consideration of the appeal on the merits.
